Package ygraph.ai.smartfox.games

Class GameClient

java.lang.Object
ygraph.ai.smartfox.games.GameClient
public class GameClient
extends java.lang.Object
A GameClient handles the communication between a GamePlayer and the gaming server, taking care of tasks such as establishing the connection, the login, and the message passing.

Messages relevant and specific to game playing will be relayed to a GamePlayer (the delegate) by calling its method: handleMessages(GameMessage msg). Requires SFS2X_API_Java.jar and sfs-client-core.jar, ...

Author:
Yong Gao (yong.gao@ubc.ca) Dec 12, 2020
